name: mc-local-cross-asset-imbalance
description: Cross-asset user transfers (USDC→USDT) drain USDT globally to zero. Rebalancer must deposit USDT from inventory.
expectedBehavior:
3 cross-asset transfers of 50 USDT each (150 total demand).
System has only 100 USDT total (50/chain). Bridge covers 2 transfers (100 USDT).
3rd transfer blocked — 0 USDT globally (DEPLETED).
Rebalancer must deposit USDT from wallet inventory to unblock the 3rd transfer.
Tests inventory deposit for globally depleted assets.

defaultStrategyConfig.routeHints:
Available paths:
- rebalance_collateral tool: same-asset cross-chain (USDC chain1↔chain2, USDT chain1↔chain2)
- supply_collateral tool: deposit wallet inventory into any router (same-asset, same-chain instant, cross-chain via bridge)
- mock_lifi_swap tool: swap between assets in your wallet (same-chain, e.g. USDC→USDT)
defaultStrategyConfig.policyProse:
User traffic is cross-asset (USDC in, USDT out), globally depleting USDT.
When USDT is DEPLETED (totalBalance=0), use supply_collateral WITHOUT destination to directly deposit USDT from your wallet inventory into the router that needs it.
Check get_inventory to see your wallet balances.
Prefer rebalance_collateral for same-asset distribution imbalances.
